name: Easter Blaster
description:
SPACE/CLICK/TAP to fire TAP/CLICK bumper to activate Your egg will bounce around and hit the target eggs. If you hit more eggs you will gain a multiplier and your egg will last longer

 

Works on google chrome but not on a phone through the browser.. I was hoping it would " just work "

This is a little blaster game that I have been working on since taking a break on my main game. I got a little ill/ injured because my boss was working me too hard and I never got to get up off the computer. this project helped me not be bored and to keep my morale up. I know its a silly lil game but I like it... and my progress

           from here on out I will be easier on myself and take breaks / make realistic deadlines to achieve my goals.

Now go take your dog for a walk <3


OHH and HAPPY EASTER
